articles.description: Coronavirus case counts are at record highs, yet many in states like Idaho are embracing a let-it-ride approach. One county with a hospital nearing capacity repealed its mask mandate.
articles.content:
But the mask requirement resulted in immense backlash, he said, in a part of the country where many people moved to escape what they see as an overbearing government.

articles.title: Media Multitasking Is Ruining Our Memory. Can We Fix It? - Singularity Hub
articles.description: Remembering something is a complicated problem for the brain. First, you have to encode the memory into your neural networks; then it has to stick around.
